column1: Little Goat Diner////Once my daughter arrived we were seated
column2: our server promptly guided us through the menu and answer our questions.  We order the soup of the day
column3: butternut squash and we shared the Korean Burger (Kilgus Goat patty) with fries.  The soup was outstanding
column6: and the right amount of spics
column7: topped with crunchy onions.  The Burger
column8: with a fry egg on top
column9: was a foodie's delight.  We closed the affair with Choco Taco
column10: a decadent treat of sour cream gelato
column13: and chocolate dipped masa chips.  I think I tasted a little of heaven.
